hi: if i only intend to have 3 primary partitions.  is it safe to delete the extended partition?
/dev/hdb2 /dev/hdb3 /dev/hdb4  are a waste for partition numbers and cant make new paritions
you can only have 4 primary (including extended) partitions, and you can only delete an extended partition if it does not contain any logical partitions
what disk layout do you ultimately want?
